title: BSOD crach during patching--->preventing all future install attempts
body:
So my computer crashed with **blue screen of death** around 70% download progress and every single time I try to re-patch or fresh install.... it never works. The error message is that it cant figure out why it crashed.{{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} 

Windows 7  64 bit

replies.body: which seems like the spot where the BSOD took place
Blue screen hasn't happened since that initial event, just a message from the client that I should check the logs at 77%

Oooooo.....BSOD is definitely no good O_O! Blue Screens typically happen due to some sort of hardware or driver malfunction that your pc just doesn't know how to deal with. The best way to troubleshoot this is going to be for our tech guys to be able to see that Blue Screen. 

Try to launch your client and get that BSOD to happen again, but have your phone or something ready to take a picture of it!! Once you can get a relatively clear  picture, attach that to a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and send it to our tech guys!
